{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Botaro |image = Portrait Botaro Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Botaro.png |caption = |race = Aumaua |subrace = Island |gender = Male |culture = [Deadfire Archipelago](/deadfireArchipelago/) |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = |level = 1 |MIG = 12 |CON = 10 |DEX = 11 |PER = 10 |INT = 10 |RES = 10 |health = 1 |damage = 5-8 {{crush}} / 5-8 {{crush}} |accuracy = 0 |penetration = 7 / 7 |deflection = 0 |fortitude = 4 |reflex = 2 |will = 0 |dr = 0 |ability = [Among the Waves](/amongTheWaves/) |location = [The Gullet](/theGullet/)
[Old City](/oldCity/), after starting [All Aboard](/allAboard/) |quests = [All Aboard](/allAboard/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = |internalname = NPC_SD_Roparu_Botaro |guid = 835156e2-4d28-4a0d-b372-2e1a4a07d242 }} '''Botaro''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|You see a man being dragged along a rickety boardwalk toward a rusty cage that swings over the abyss. He strains against the guard's grip. The guard delivers a savage backhand.}} Botaro was accused of consorting with foreign criminals - and to keep the Roparu in line, "justice" was administered swiftly by the [Overseer](/overseerHitenga/) in the form of his immediate removal to the Old City far, far below. Botaro is [Biha](/biha/)'s partner, and his death leaves her widowed and left to care for her three children alone. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [All Aboard](/allAboard/) |none = |other = * After starting [All Aboard](/allAboard/), his body can be found in the [Old City Overlook](/oldCityOverlook/) a short distance west of the lift. You can interact with his soul to reveal some information about his last moments alive. }} ## =Quests = * [All Aboard](/allAboard/): Botaro can be seen being lowered into the Old City upon approaching the lift in [The Gullet](/theGullet/). Needless to say, he doesn't last long enough for you to get the opportunity to talk to him - alive at least. ## Gallery PE2_Botaro_Dead.png | Botaro's corpse [Category:The Gullet characters](/categoryTheGulletCharacters/)

{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Botaro |image = Portrait Botaro Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Botaro.png |caption = |race = Aumaua |subrace = Island |gender = Male |culture = [[Deadfire Archipelago]] |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = |level = 1 |MIG = 12 |CON = 10 |DEX = 11 |PER = 10 |INT = 10 |RES = 10 |health = 1 |damage = 5-8 {{crush}} / 5-8 {{crush}} |accuracy = 0 |penetration = 7 / 7 |deflection = 0 |fortitude = 4 |reflex = 2 |will = 0 |dr = 0 |ability = [[Among the Waves]] |location = [[The Gullet]]
[[Old City]], after starting [[All Aboard]] |quests = [[All Aboard]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = |internalname = NPC_SD_Roparu_Botaro |guid = 835156e2-4d28-4a0d-b372-2e1a4a07d242 }} '''Botaro''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== {{Description|You see a man being dragged along a rickety boardwalk toward a rusty cage that swings over the abyss. He strains against the guard's grip. The guard delivers a savage backhand.}} Botaro was accused of consorting with foreign criminals - and to keep the Roparu in line, "justice" was administered swiftly by the [[Overseer Hitenga|Overseer]] in the form of his immediate removal to the Old City far, far below. Botaro is [[Biha]]'s partner, and his death leaves her widowed and left to care for her three children alone. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [[All Aboard]] |none = |other = * After starting [[All Aboard]], his body can be found in the [[Old City Overlook]] a short distance west of the lift. You can interact with his soul to reveal some information about his last moments alive. }} ===Quests=== * [[All Aboard]]: Botaro can be seen being lowered into the Old City upon approaching the lift in [[The Gullet]]. Needless to say, he doesn't last long enough for you to get the opportunity to talk to him - alive at least. ==Gallery== PE2_Botaro_Dead.png | Botaro's corpse [[Category:The Gullet characters]]
title: Botaro
